metadata.topic: Feminists should change their title (maybe to egalitarians) to disassociate themselves from the extremists.

moderator_initial_opinion:
b) Generally Disagree with the statement

I generally disagree because changing the title to disassociate from extremists would be misleading and could erase the legitimate goals of feminism. Feminism is a broad movement advocating for gender equality, and rebranding to avoid association with extremists would not address the core issues or the diversity of perspectives within the movement.
